titles: The frauds of Romish monks and priests set forth in eight letters / lately written by a gentleman in his journey into Italy, and publish'd for the benefit of the publick.
author: Gavin, Antonio, fl. 1726.
publisher: Printed by Samuel Roycraft for Robert Clavell ...,
notes: Dedication signed: G. D.E.E.A.P. which stands for Gabriel d'Emiliane Angelicanae Presbyter--British Museum catalogue.
Gabriel d'Emiliane is the pseudonym of Antonio Gavin--Halkett and Laing and Wing.
Imperfect: pages stained, with print showthrough and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
